metadata.title: CVE-2016-9827 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The _iprintf function in outputtxt.c in the listswf tool in libming 0.4.7allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) viaa crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
